events.message: The applicant has completed and submitted the personal loan application for medical expenses and debt consolidation.
Loan application reviewed and categorized under Personal Loan due to the stated purpose regarding medical bills and debt.
A loan officer has been assigned to handle the personal loan application and manage further process steps.
Conducted the initial review of the applicant's financial information and loan purpose as a personal loan.
Requested necessary supporting documents including income proof, bank statements, and medical bills from the applicant.
Applicant successfully submitted all requested documents such as pay stubs, tax returns, and medical statements.
Completed credit check on the applicant revealing a moderate credit history with some outstanding debts.
Risk assessment performed considering the credit profile and purpose of the personal loan for medical and debt relief.
Presented the personal loan offer to the applicant including terms, interest rate, repayment schedule, and fees.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer and requested clarification on repayment options and early payoff policies.
Application escalated to senior loan committee for further evaluation due to the applicant’s complex debt structure.
Senior committee has approved the personal loan application after review of all documentation and risk factors.
Approved personal loan amount disbursed to applicant’s nominated bank account to assist with medical bills and debt repayment.
Followed up with the applicant to ensure receipt of funds and satisfaction with loan terms and disbursement timing.
Personal loan application process officially closed after successful funding and positive follow-up interaction.
